alert.note: Alert for Burney Basin, Eastern Shasta County; Mountains Southwestern Shasta County to Western Colusa County; Northeast Foothills, Sacramento Valley; Shasta Lake Area, Northern Shasta County; Western Plumas County, Lassen Park (California) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Storm Warning issued February 25 at 4:00AM PST until March 01 at 4:00AM PST by NWS Sacramento
info.description: ...WINTER STORM WARNING IN EFFECT FROM 4 AM SUNDAY TO 4 AM PST WEDNESDAY... * WHAT...Heavy snow expected. Total snow accumulations of 10 to 30 inches possible, locally higher amounts up to 4 feet above 3500 feet. Winds could gust as high as 45 mph. * WHERE...Shasta Lake Area / Northern Shasta County, Burney Basin / Eastern Shasta County, Mountains Southwestern Shasta County to Western Colusa County, Northeast Foothills/Sacramento Valley and Western Plumas County/Lassen Park. * WHEN...From 4 AM Sunday to 4 AM PST Wednesday. * IMPACTS...Travel could be very difficult to impossible. Gusty winds and snow could bring down tree branches leading to power outages. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Snow levels 2000 to 3000 feet Sunday falling to 1000 to 2000 feet Monday. Snow Sunday with snow showers lingering into Sunday night. A second round of heavier snow is expected Monday into early Wednesday.
info.instruction: If you must travel, keep an extra flashlight, food, and water in your vehicle in case of an emergency. The latest road conditions for the state you are calling from can be obtained by calling 5 1 1.

area.areaDesc: Burney Basin, Eastern Shasta County; Mountains Southwestern Shasta County to Western Colusa County; Northeast Foothills, Sacramento Valley; Shasta Lake Area, Northern Shasta County; Western Plumas County, Lassen Park
